events.text: Taking a 15 minute breather from building to answer some questions on here related to @believeapp, @launchcoin, and $LAUNCHCOIN. Ask away!
Awesome open-source project that just launched on Believe! https://t.co/quYFQvk9JO
“Our vibe raise was super successful”

At Believe, our objective is to create an amazing experience for both founders and traders.

One thing we’re consistently hearing from traders: Believe coins need to have more utility

Over the next week or so, we’re rolling out tools to make this possible — making it seamless https://t.co/jcKo4goeMu

We’ve shipped a v1 for most of our ideas. Now we’re focused on tightening things up and making everything feel more cohesive.

Some iOS updates just went live — more improvements coming later this week. https://t.co/Qy32YryfVm
Greatness starts with your belief.

The amount of inbound from talented founders looking to launch on Believe has been incredible.

We are going to revolutionize the entire startup ecosystem.

The past few days have been wild — and I’m incredibly grateful for the energy behind our vision.

We’ve seen a surge of interest from founders, but we’re going to pause on featuring new projects for now to focus on supporting the ones already building. Our priority is making sure

Believe will be the App Store but for coins — curated, trusted, and safe. Our most important role is to create harmony between builders and traders.

CT has created an incredibly powerful ecosystem. Believe will take it to new heights.

It’s going to take time to realize this

Product x Coin Integration is what is going to take projects launched on Believe to infinity and beyond. 

When a product is great and the coin is core to the experience, the coin wins.

To make it easy, we’re building a simple API that enables founders to seamlessly weave their

Here’s a demo of the upcoming Believe API — going live shortly.

The goal of the Believe API is to make it easy for builders to create harmony between their product and coin, no matter what their product does.

The first API endpoint lets builders burn their coin https://t.co/JbmYZaloPI

$10M+ paid out to builders in less than a month. Past 24H updates:

1. New website just went live. Builders can now launch their projects from the web (enabling smoother launches).

2. We are resuming Believe endorsed launches imminently.

3. Believe API and burning mechanism is
API is now live: https://t.co/Cdvnghwiar

Sorry for the chaos over the past 24 hours — live iteration in crypto is tough. But staying stagnant isn’t an option; we have to keep evolving.

Next up: DAMM v2 with anti-sniper mechanisms.

Moving forward, Believe will not be the arbiter of truth.

No more featured/verification. Market decides what deserves attention and what does not.

I plan to interact with products that I think are interesting even more, and I encourage you to voice your opinions too.

We’ve
https://t.co/Q9UEcb6d9b
In case it wasn’t already clear — Believe x Launch Coin harmony is in the works. https://t.co/F64nYifJTf

Currently focused on:

1. Reactivating the @launchcoin X account
2. Launch in-app coin creation + categories (this will be cool)
3. Help founders get their pending launches live

More to come. https://t.co/pUWPY7KsbS
Will be live on @TBPN at ~2:45 PM ET. Excited! https://t.co/hLfFlJQpuW

If any traders in our community want to record an explainer video for founders on how to run a successful coin launch, tag me in it and I’ll make sure it gets forwarded to founders who are pending launch.

(we’re also working on our own iteration of such video) https://t.co/Eil6PWdUbY

Founders are deeply incentivized to make their coin work — there’s just a learning curve at the start. That’s why resources like this from the community are so valuable.

LFG. This kind of stuff gets me fired up! More please! https://t.co/pACUhThXjl

Someone needs to build a “Believe University”, similar to Whop University, and launch a coin tied to it.

I’ll shill the coin harder than any coin has ever been shilled.
https://t.co/33y73wHo3E

One month ago today.

We’re focused on onboarding thousands of new coin deployers.

Short term price action is irrelevant.

Trust the process.

Believe. https://t.co/uwStND4f5F

Believe took off because we made launching a coin feel legit, even to people who never thought they’d ever launch one.

Our goal is to remove the stigma around launching a coin and bring entirely new creators into the space. If you have something to offer the world or already
GM to the 31,129 holders who believe — and to those that will join us soon.
What Believe Projects should I take a peek at?

At 15, I raised $500K from venture capitalists and dropped out of high school. That early belief changed the trajectory of my life — and without it, I wouldn’t be here today.

Our mission with Believe is to pass that opportunity forward — to empower hundreds of thousands of
Public display of Creator Fees is now live in the latest version of the iOS app. It is not perfect but it's getting there.
Coin categories. Live tomorrow. https://t.co/4CcCBpMHhL
Launch Coin flow in latest iOS update — live now. Still needs work but quite a solid v1.

Coin Categories are now live (very much a v1). It’s technically a simple feature, but I believe it’ll have an outsized impact — helping first-time traders discover coins that they actually believe in.

Moving forward, all coins will auto-list in the app and be ranked by Market https://t.co/xiFgxwgSXz
Going to be quite free for the next few hours — happy to answer any and all Believe-related questions. Fire away!

Believe has been live for just six weeks, and we’ve really rewritten the narrative. It’s been chaotic, as expected when something finds product-market fit so quickly. 

Despite the chaos, I’m confident in the direction we’re headed. LFG.

New anti-sniper mechanisms are now live. Like everything we ship, they’ll need some iteration to get just right. Let’s see what happens!

One thing you might not know: Believe is currently built by a team of just four. Since launch, we’ve been shipping fast, pulling countless

What are thoughts on the new anti-sniper mechanisms so far?

Getting mixed reviews. https://t.co/uFdmTC5pPA

Think back to the 1980s, when venture capital first started gaining traction — it was a strange idea at the time. A random entity giving you millions of dollars to chase a vision and build something new?

That’s exactly where launching a coin is today. It still feels unfamiliar

Starting today, I’m shifting how I share updates — one post in the morning, one in the evening. I’ll still be replying to things that catch my eye, but trying to be more structured. Let’s see how it goes.

Right now, my top priority is onboarding new creators. That’s what put

We have one focus: onboard net-new deployers.

Founders. Creators. Artists. Communities. Politicians. They're on their way.
Believe is making a major investment in bringing top talent into the ecosystem. More details dropping later this week.

VC is dying. If I were starting a company today, I wouldn’t raise any.

Founders don’t need it anymore. With AI, it’s possible to go far with little outside capital.

“$X raised” used to be the flex. Now it’s ARR and MRR. Two years ago, no one put these metrics in their bios —

I’ve spent a lot of time the past few days talking with founders who’ve launched on Believe. I usually go into these calls feeling a bit anxious — we still have so much to improve. But I always walk away inspired and incredibly grateful for the patience and belief these builders

It’s now completely possible to build a unicorn without raising venture capital.

The growing standard will be to raise a small amount, equivalent to a pre-seed round at most, and to operate profitably from day one.
Stripe for coins.
Patience is bitter but its fruit is sweet. So true!
Believe.
Believe is playing the long game: building with intention, attracting real builders, and standing as a pillar of integrity in a space where that’s still rare.

I’m hearing your feedback and I want to focus more on supporting our community.

I’m going to be picking a few projects to start with and will be using my own personal funds to support them.

One of my main focus from now on will be to spotlight our best creators and help them

I've loaded a wallet with some SOL to support projects in the Believe ecosystem!

Here is the wallet address for full transparency: DjAfkjAV7qD6U2qjjU5RdcuzXwdk1gF3CtiWwGZc8pxJ

What coin should I buy first? https://t.co/8dtTmhJAb8

I've been doing a bad job recently with regard to transparency, public trust, and community alignment. That’s on me. It’s been greatly requested that we provide more transparency related to our pending flywheel (FW).

When Believe’s volume surged in May, I didn’t even know what a

The Believe API v2 is live now, focused on enabling creators to build flywheels for their coins.

We believe for any coin to have real value, it must have a flywheel. We’ve found that many creators want to build these mechanisms but lack the tools to easily do so. With the https://t.co/WeLKDGbNVK

Believe API docs —
https://t.co/v5rhhCvZpO
Creator coins would be far more compelling if their value was determined by the attention on a creator, rather than the attention on the creator's coin.

Belief is most powerful when it's not yet popular.

Believe in something.

If we want to bring new creators into crypto, we need to eliminate the stigma around launching a coin.

What we’re launching this week will break down that barrier in a big way.
More creators would launch a coin if they knew how easy it is to launch one

Democratize access to opportunity.

No more gatekeepers. Everyone deserves a shot.

Every time a person of influence launches a coin, new participants join the game.

What single moment brought more attention to crypto this year than anything else?

Trump coin. https://t.co/hE368XObJo

Excited to share that we’ve acquired Abode (@getabode).

Abode’s Founder @_jsmth has a strong track record of building beautiful and intuitive consumer products. Attracting top creators to crypto starts with building great, welcoming products.

As Believe evolves, we’re going to https://t.co/0hKfSxFRu7

Hi Believe Community, and to those potentially considering joining us,

I’ve been told my posts can feel a bit impersonal, even “ChatGPT-ish.” That’s just my natural writing style, but for this one I’m going to make more of an effort to be more open / vulnerable.

When Believe
Memecoins → Beliefcoins

Average hold time today: ~30 seconds

Best founders: building on 5+ year timelines

Slight gap.

If we want serious creators and projects to launch coins and stay, hold times need to increase. 

Believe in something.
Prediction markets and memecoins will merge into one.
Belief is a far more powerful force than raw attention.
All you have to do is Believe.

Believe will penalize rotators at the platform level.

Rotators ruin the ecosystem. Everything great in the world starts with belief and ends without it. https://t.co/4lPwGoaNOs
Going to be ditching this wallet and will setup a new public one. Will share in the near future.

Creators should have the freedom to build where they believe their project will thrive. To support that, we’re introducing a migration tool that makes it simple for non-Believe projects to move into the Believe ecosystem.

To test it, I’ll be migrating a coin I launched
https://t.co/61C0O93vV1

25% of $RIPVC holders have already migrated to $PASTERNAK. On October 1, 2025:

1. The conversion pool from $RIPVC to $PASTERNAK will officially close.

2. We will liquidate all $RIPVC in our possession, rendering the coin valueless.

Going forward, $PASTERNAK will serve as the
All funds collected from selling $RIPVC on October 1 will be sent to the $PASTERNAK LP.
OK we set the migration period to be too long. We're accelerating the conversion pool close date to September 24, 2025. $RIPVC will be liquidated on October 1, 2025.

If you haven't used our iOS app in a while, I recommend giving it a spin.

One experiment in this release is unique tickers. Right now, duplicate or look-alike tickers can create confusion and open the door to scams. By making each ticker one of a kind, we aim to build a safer https://t.co/CvgFU8QI8i

Full $PASTERNAK mode is on.

Migration pool is now closed. Vast majority of $RIPVC supply will be liquidated on October 1, 2025.

The Believe ecosystem has quietly processed close to $6B in trading volume, only a few months since launching.

I’ve watched hundreds of young creators begin with nothing, build a community of believers, and raise hundreds of thousands, sometimes millions, to pursue their vision.
Migration complete.

I recommend only supporting Believe projects that you genuinely believe in, meaning ones you could see yourself holding for at least a few months.

Rather than rushing to buy in early, take the time to research the founder, who they are, what they have built before, and why they

Inspiring story shared by a Believe founder.

Broke and living with his parents, faced with the choice of raising venture capital or launching on Believe. He chose Believe, and his latest project has generated $3M in revenue over the past 48 hours. Congrats! https://t.co/UaMMaoeqIU

$BELIEVE was created from the ground up to support and advance our ecosystem. The next few weeks are stacked with big moves. Very excited. LFG!

I’ll be on X throughout the day answering your questions about $BELIEVE and the Believe ecosystem. https://t.co/9scarkN8IM

When I launched the original Pasternak coin on Clout (which later was rebranded to Launch Coin) back in January, I had never even purchased a Solana coin before. My belief at the time was that creators should only profit from trading fees rather than selling their own coin. As a

Chat is my favorite feature we’ve shipped since Believe launched. Most creators and their communities don’t really know what coins are / what they’re for. To bridge that gap, we need a “one size fits all” model that makes the concept easy to understand. 

Believe Chat feels like https://t.co/Ubpaw3IuK7
